title: Mobile Education for Nurses on Responding to Psychological Violence Against Women

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing knowledge and basic concepts of women's health management
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, providing situational learning modules through mobile apps.

learning_goals: Can explain the definition, causes, symptoms, and long-term effects of psychological violence with over 80% accuracy.
Can analyze cases of psychological violence against women in nursing settings through a three-stage process: identification, approach, and referral.
Can apply legal mandatory reporting procedures and community linkage systems in case-based simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
